snippet: The parents of a 2-year-old Flint girl sued the city and Michigan on Monday over high levels of lead in the child’s blood, accusing officials of callous and deliberate indifference over contaminated water.
abstract: Luke Waid and Michelle Rodriguez file federal lawsuit against Flint, Mich, and state accusing officials of callous and deliberate indifference over contaminated water after high levels of lead were found in blood of their 2-year-old daughter; top city and state officials are named as defendants.
lead_paragraph: The parents of a 2-year-old Flint girl sued the city and Michigan on Monday over high levels of lead in the child’s blood, accusing officials of callous and deliberate indifference over contaminated water.

headline.main: Michigan: Parents Sue Over Flint Toddler’s Lead Level
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Parents Sue Over Flint Toddler’s Lead Level
